import React, {useEffect} from 'react'; import {Fade} from 'react-reveal'; import '../styles/Foundations.css'; import foundations from '../images/foundations.png'; import tools from '../images/tools.png'; import handson from '../images/handson.png'; import Nav from '../components/Nav'; import LandingSection from '../components/LandingSection'; const Foundations = (props) => { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0) }, []) return (

Hands-on Practice

Students will have the opportunity to practice the fundamentals during and after the workshop through private sessions with the mentors.

Toolkit Included

Students will be provided a toolkit consisting of

Wahl Magic clip
Andis Slimline Pro | Andis Profoil
Styling comb | Flat top comb
Scissors | Straight razor
Barber cape
Spray bottle

Day One

(10:00am - 4:00pm)
  • Introduction
  • Health & Safety
  • Understanding Tools
  • Consultation
  • Demonstration - Lvl 1 Fade & Taper
  • Lunch (provided)
  • Hands-on practice

Day Two

(10:00am - 4:00pm)
  • Review of day one
  • Demonstration - Skin fade
  • Demonstration - Scissor Work
  • Demonstration - Beard Work
  • Lunch (provided)
  • Hands-on practice
) } export default Foundations;
